name: Lockpicking Larcenist
description:
Thieves, Law Enforcement, Locksmiths and Citizens alike know that if they want a lock opened, you're the one to take it to.

As an ex-criminal turned lockpicker-for-hire, you're job is to figure out how to open them, each with unique pin compositions and combinations.

Raise each pin up to test what levels they fit on, using a color system based on your attempts to deduce the position of each pin.

You'll have 3 tries before your meddling breaks the lock, so choose wisely.

Made for the 2-Button Game Jam.
